Package com.radixdlt.client.core.network.epics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectWebSocketEpic
    Epic which begins a websocket connection when a ConnectWebSocketAction is seen.
    DiscoverNodesEpic
    Epic which manages simple bootstrapping and discovers nodes one degree out from the initial seeds.
    FetchAtomsEpic
    Epic which emits atoms on a FETCH_ATOMS_REQUEST query forever until a FETCH_ATOMS_CANCEL action occurs.
    FindANodeEpic
    Epic which finds a connected sharded node when a FindANode request is received.
    RadixJsonRpcAutoCloseEpic
    Epic which attempts to close a websocket when a Json Rpc method is finished executing.
    RadixJsonRpcAutoConnectEpic
    Epic which attempts to open a websocket when a Json Rpc method onto a given node is dispatched.
    RadixJsonRpcMethodEpic<T extends JsonRpcMethodAction>
    Epic which executes Json Rpc methods over the websocket as Json Rpc requests come in.
    SubmitAtomEpic
    Epic which submits an atom to a node over websocket and emits events as the atom is accepted by the network.
    WebSocketEventsEpic
    Epic which emits websocket events from each node
    WebSocketsEpic
    Epic which manages the store of low level webSockets and connects epics dependent on useage of these webSockets.
    WebSocketsEpic.WebSockets
    All websockets are created and managed here.
    WebSocketsEpic.WebSocketsEpicBuilder
    Builds a WebSocketsEpic composed of epics which require websockets.
